title: Bilgewater Event Art
body:
Hey guys! I'm sorry Riot if it turns out this is something i ought not be posting.
I just wanted people to be able to use these amazing artworks as desktop backgrounds (because I looked around for some official wallpaper versions for a while, but to no avail). Seriously, I've become quite enthralled with the Bilgewater story/event and inspired by the artwork involved. Props go out to the artists and Riot for running a cool event (not to mention the details put into the Butcher's Bridge map: Glorious). 

Anyway, hopefully this works, I got the images off the page source, so they aren't simply screenshots. (I would suggest opening the links in new tab).

World first, followed by characters:


And again, I'm sorry if this violates any rules by Riot. Let me know and I will delete the post ASAP. I understand copyright enough to know that my "distribution" of this art might not be allowed. Even though I'm not selling it or claiming it as my own.

replies.body:
Yeah, we could do a **much **better job of surfacing more of the fantastic work our artists create...  making it more available, in more ways that are easy to use (such as desktop backgrounds, etc.)  Thanks for bringing this up.  So much of what’s coming out now (IMO) is so amazing, I'm kind of in awe.  We should definitely make it more accessible.  

Personally, I’ve been using Bilgewater art as my desktop for a while now, and am super happy to see it now out there in the world  :-) :-) :-)
